message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to start with an offer of $9500 for the product. What are your thoughts?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. However, I was hoping to get a bit closer to my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than $8500. How about we try $9000?
I understand your position, Alice. Let me see if I can come up with a compromise. My counteroffer is $8750 for the product. I hope this proposal will be more acceptable.
